meanings.definition: The act of teasing or making fun of someone.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the ribbings from the other kids made Tim feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The ribbings from his friends were all in good fun.
meanings.sent3: Sarah couldn't help but laugh at the playful ribbings from her brother.
meanings.sent4: The ribbings from the comedian were lighthearted and entertaining.
meanings.sent5: The ribbings at the comedy show had everyone in stitches.

meanings.definition: A series of raised ridges or lines on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The wooden table had intricate ribbings along its edges.
meanings.sent2: She ran her fingers over the ribbings of the textured wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The ribbings on the pottery added a unique touch to the design.
meanings.sent4: The artist used ribbings in the sculpture to create depth and texture.
meanings.sent5: The carvings on the ancient door displayed beautiful ribbings.

meanings.definition: The material used to create ribbed fabric.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer carefully selected the ribbings for the new collection.
meanings.sent2: She loved the soft feel of the ribbings against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The ribbings in the store came in a variety of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent4: The ribbings used in the sweater gave it a cozy and textured look.
meanings.sent5: The ribbings in the scarf added a stylish touch to her outfit.
